alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 21 at 5:06AM CDT until April 23 at 5:36AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 53.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM CDT Friday was 53.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 53.4 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 52.1 feet on 04/07/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon.
